TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GCHandle extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供用于从非托管内存访问托管对象的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to access a managed object from unmanaged memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构用于枚举，以创建对应于任何托管对象的句柄。The structure is used with the enumeration to create a handle corresponding to any managed object. 此句柄可以是四种类型之一： `Weak`， `WeakTrackResurrection`， `Normal`，或`Pinned`。This handle can be one of four types: `Weak`, `WeakTrackResurrection`, `Normal`, or `Pinned`. 当已分配了句柄时，可用于防止在非托管客户端保留唯一的引用时，垃圾回收器正在收集托管的对象。When the handle has been allocated, you can use it to prevent the managed object from being collected by the garbage collector when an unmanaged client holds the only reference. 没有这样的句柄，该对象可以在收集垃圾回收器在完成其工作代表非托管客户端之前。Without such a handle, the object can be collected by the garbage collector before completing its work on behalf of the unmanaged client. 你还可以使用创建钉住的对象返回的内存地址可防止垃圾回收器移动对象在内存中。You can also use to create a pinned object that returns a memory address to prevent the garbage collector from moving the object in memory. 当该句柄超出范围时您必须显式释放它通过调用方法; 否则为内存泄漏可能会出现。When the handle goes out of scope you must explicitly release it by calling the method; otherwise, memory leaks may occur. 当释放固定句柄时，关联的对象将解除固定，并且将成为适合进行垃圾回收，如果不有任何其他引用了它。When you free a pinned handle, the associated object will be unpinned and will become eligible for garbage collection, if there are no other references to it. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`App`创建托管的对象使用的句柄类`GCHandle.Alloc`方法，以防止将托管的对象收集。The following example shows an `App` class that creates a handle to a managed object using the `GCHandle.Alloc` method, which prevents the managed object from being collected. 调用`EnumWindows`方法将传递委托与托管的对象 （两者都声明为托管类型，但不是显示），并将强制转换的句柄。A call to the `EnumWindows` method passes a delegate and a managed object (both declared as managed types, but not shown), and casts the handle to an . 非托管的函数将类型作为回调函数的参数传递回调用方。The unmanaged function passes the type back to the caller as a parameter of the callback function. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/vb/sample.vb#1)]

public: IntPtr AddrOfPinnedObject();

summary.span: 在 句柄中检索对象的地址。

span.span: Retrieves the address of an object in a handle.

returns.span: 形式的固定对象的地址。

span.span: The address of the pinned object as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于获取指向对象的稳定的指针。This method is used to get a stable pointer to the object. 固定对象可防止垃圾回收器在内存中，从而减少垃圾回收器的效率移动它。Pinning an object prevents the garbage collector from moving it around in memory, thereby reducing the efficiency of the garbage collector.

exception.span: 该句柄是 以外的任何类型。

span.span: The handle is any type other than .

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 为指定的对象分配句柄。

span.span: Allocates a handle for the specified object.

summary.span: 为指定的对象分配 句柄。

span.span: Allocates a handle for the specified object.

returns.span: 一个新的 ，它保护对象不被垃圾回收。

span.span: A new that protects the object from garbage collection.

returns.span: 当不再需要 时，必须通过 将其释放。

span.span: This must be released with when it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 句柄是对象的不透明的这意味着你无法解析它包含通过该句柄的地址。 handles are opaque, which means that you cannot resolve the address of the object it contains through the handle. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`App`创建托管的对象使用的句柄类`GCHandle.Alloc`方法，以防止将托管的对象收集。The following example shows an `App` class that creates a handle to a managed object using the `GCHandle.Alloc` method, which prevents the managed object from being collected. 调用`EnumWindows`方法将传递委托与托管的对象 （两者都声明为托管类型，但不是显示），并将强制转换的句柄。A call to the `EnumWindows` method passes a delegate and a managed object (both declared as managed types, but not shown), and casts the handle to an . 非托管的函数将类型作为回调函数的参数传递回调用方。The unmanaged function passes the type back to the caller as a parameter of the callback function. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方必须确保为给定句柄只能调用一次。The caller must ensure that for a given handle, is called only once. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`App`创建托管的对象使用的句柄类`GCHandle.Alloc`方法，以防止将托管的对象收集。The following example shows an `App` class that creates a handle to a managed object using the `GCHandle.Alloc` method, which prevents the managed object from being collected. 调用`EnumWindows`方法将传递委托与托管的对象 （两者都声明为托管类型，但不是显示），并将强制转换的句柄。A call to the `EnumWindows` method passes a delegate and a managed object (both declared as managed types, but not shown), and casts the handle to an . 非托管的函数将类型作为回调函数的参数传递回调用方。The unmanaged function passes the type back to the caller as a parameter of the callback function. value.span: 如果分配了句柄，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the handle is allocated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性时使用句柄来确定如果仍然可用。Use this property when using handles to determine if the is still available. 当垃圾回收器收集对象，仍在终结器中重新恢复句柄。When the garbage collector collects the object, the handle can still be resurrected in the finalizer. 在这种情况下，不分配了句柄 （它位于丢失垃圾回收器尝试回收该对象时），即使目标对象是否有效。In that case, the handle is not allocated (it is lost when the garbage collector attempts to collect the object), even though the target object is valid.
